boardgame.name: Ace of Aces: Handy Rotary Series
Duelo de Águias
Duelo de Águias: 1984
boardgame.description: Ace of Aces is an innovative 1-on-1 combat game that simulates a dogfight between WWI aircraft. Each player has a book with pictures of what they see out the cockpit of their airplane. Each player selects a maneuver (bank left, barrel roll, etc.) and tells their opponent a page number to turn to. This new page, when cross indexed with the maneuver made, gives the page number that shows the results of the chosen maneuver. The object of the game is to get your opponent in your sights and shoot them down._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are advanced rules for fuel consumption as well as a campaign game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1980 Charles S. Roberts Gamers Choice Award Winner
1993 Origins Awards Product Hall of Fame Inductee
boardgame.boardgameimplementation: Ace of Aces: Handy Rotary Deluxe Edition
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 66: Combat systems

listing.notes: This is a used version of the WWI Air Combat Game, Ace of Aces. It is the Handy Rotary Series, but I am unsure if it is the earlier or later edition. It does not have the original slip cover, they are the books only. Someone who is looking for a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;like new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; version of this game NEEDS TO LOOK ELSEWHERE, but if you simply want this game, mine will do just fine. The edges of the books are dirtied, but there are no tears on any pages, therefore it is playable. Please note that shipping to places outside the United States will be $10.00.
